entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:51 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 05:16 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:50 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:50 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
